title: (x) Das Parfume movie title sequence - Nicolas Cochin {Tim D}
content:
Was wonderning what font they use for the title sequence? The S and the N have very distincitve shapes. Sorry, that’s the best jpg i could find on the net from it. They added the some fuzzyness to it here, in the film it comes clean. Thanks for ideas!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bild 8.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124321/http:/typophile.com/files/Bild%208.png) | 5.84 KB |

 [‹ DATSUN - Get That Datsun Difference](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124321/http:/typophile.com/node/30703 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Transitional serif face w/ Latin and Cyrillic - ITC New Baskerville {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124321/http:/typophile.com/node/30680 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Brown Fox

comments.content:
Ah of course - spot on. Forgot how nice Cochin uppercase only can be.  
Thanks Tim!
If you could read Dutch and read [Unzipped](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124321/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=95) you’d already know. ;^)
